name: dodada-design-tokens
description: Design System multiplataforma (iOS, Android, KMP, Web). Design Tokens en JSON; listo para usar como git submodule.
author: Dodada Team

scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p=require('path'); ['build','dist'].forEach(d=>{const r=p.join(process.cwd(),d); if(fs.existsSync(r)) fs.rmSync(r,{recursive:true}); console.log('Cleaned',d);});"
